- Provide troubleshooting assistance to the application support team.

- University degree or technical program, Social/Physical/Life Science, Business, or related field OR Minimum two (3) years’ experience in AutoCAD or a directly related field.

- 2 years’ Experience working with AutoCAD MEP drawings and data analysis.

, and it is demonstrated in our support of our colleagues and the animal health industry. We have nine colleague resources groups whose members spread awareness, foster inclusivity and make a positive impact on our business and communities.
Our commitment to advancing Diversity, Equity and Inclusion has earned us recognitions as a 2024 Catalyst Award recipient and a Top 50 Company for Workplace Fairness by Fair360 (formerly DiversityInc). Zoetis has also been named a Best Place to Work for LGBTQ+ Equality, a Best Company for Working Parents, a Top Company for Executive Women, among many others. Learn more
